summary: When "American Psycho" was released early in 2000 it reaffirmed author Bret Easton Ellis as the controversial "bad boy" of contemporary American Fiction. "This is Not an Exit" reveals the world inhabited by Ellis. In HD.
cast: Dechen Thurman|Rachel Weisz|Jason Bushman|Paul Blackthorne|Marieclaire Camilleri|Kelly Rogers|Noelle McCutchen|Natalie Avital|David Monahan|Michael Cavalier|Huger Foote|John Bryan|Justine Melman|Cory Travalena|Tamsin Pike|Vered Halkin|Casey Schacter|Will Self|Bret Easton Ellis|Jay McInerney
title: This Is Not an Exit: The Fictional World of Bret Easton Ellis
